nodes.text: A Belugan guard lived on the planet Quarzite and worked for Major Rigosso during the Clone Wars.

Around 21 BBY, this Belugan, along with a fellow guard served under Major Rigosso and joined a group made up of six bounty hunters, Boba Fett, Bossk, Dengar, Latts Razzi, C-21 Highsinger, and Asajj Ventress. This force was created to protect a very important cargo shipment that was to be delivered to Belugan leader Lord Otua Blank.
While en route to to Blank, Kage Warriors attacked the subtram the Belugans were traveling on, and were able to throw both guards over the rails, though they likely survived their falls.
